description: AMD has been on a software / container / documentation spree recently around ROCm and today are announcing another software addition to the ROCm portfolio: AITER...
title: AMD Announces AITER For ROCm To Help Boost AI Performance

description: Microsoft's newest open-source contribution to the Linux kernel being proposed is... Hornet, a Linux security module (LSM) for providing signature verification of eBPF programs...
title: Microsoft Proposes "Hornet" Security Module For The Linux Kernel

description: It's been over three years since the last ReactOS open-source operating system release for this platform working on API/ABI compatibility with Microsoft Windows. Today ReactOS 0.4.15 was finally published...
title: ReactOS 0.4.15 Released For This "Open-Source Windows" OS With Tons Of Enhancements

description: With the Linux 6.14 stable kernel likely debuting on Sunday, the Linux 6.15 merge window will then open for kicking off the next development cycle. There's a lot of exciting changes and new features building up ahead of the Linux 6.15 merge window...
title: New Intel/AMD GPU Features, Apple Touch Bar Drivers & Other Likely Changes For Linux 6.15

description: Following a slew of hardware announcements in the past few months like the RP2350 shipping, Raspberry Pi 5 16GB, Raspberry Pi Monitor, and Raspberry Pi 500, today they have a new software announcement. Today they formally announced "rpi-image-gen" as a new tool to help customers in crafting customized software OS images...
title: Raspberry Pi Announces rpi-image-gen To Help Craft Custom Software Images

description: Submitted today ahead of the Linux 6.14 stable release expected Sunday is a lone scheduler fix for the kernel. This patch is for reverting a change made to the Linux kernel two years ago that ended up regressing some workloads with a significant performance hit...
title: Linux 6.14 Sees Last Minute Fix For A Two Year Old Regression Causing A 30% Performance Drop

description: A set of eleven patches being worked on for the ASUS HID and platform drivers work to enhance the support for the AMD Strix Halo powered ROG Flow Z13 (2025) laptop as well as adding RGB control support for the ROG Ally gaming handheld...
title: ASUS ROG Flow Z13 Improvements For Linux, RGB Controls For The ROG Ally

description: The AMD P-State Linux kernel driver for CPU frequency scaling with modern Ryzen processors has been working out quite well and proving very effective over the prior ACPI CPUFreq generic driver use. Beyond recently being extended to becoming the default for EPYC 9005 "Turin" processrs, AMD P-State has recently been seeing some patches for additional feature work...
title: Dynamic EPP & Raw EPP Features Coming To AMD P-State Driver
